name: Toasted goblins
description:
In a world of floating islands, there are 2 goblin clans who are deadly enemies. Their best bombers fight for victory and the honor of their clan.

Play as one of those goblin bombers in crazy battles and burn enemy goblins.

Features:

  • Game for 1 or 2 players (local multiplayer).
  • Competitive frenzied and chaotic battles.
  • Use powerups to gain advantage (or to generate chaos) in battles.
  • 3 different scenarios where to burn goblins.
  • More than 50 folk or folk-based songs (mostly European) played during battles.
  • Full controller support.
  • Includes version for Android (ONLY TABLET - Not supported on mobile).
  • Burn and toast goblins at will :)

Controls:

Keyboard controls

  • WASD / Arrows - Movement
  • Space - Throw bomb
  • E - Use item

Gamepad controls

  • D-pad - Movement
  • Button A / Button X - Throw bomb
  • Button RB / Button R1 - Use item

Development

This is a demo of the game, which is in its Beta version. More characters, items, and stages may be added to the game in the future.

Installation

For Windows, Mac and Linux, download the corresponding zip file and unzip it. Then execute the main executable file.

For tablet download the .apk file. Then execute the apk in your download folder and accept installation when asking.
